alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Keya Paha (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 11:16AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN KEYA PAHA AND WEST CENTRAL BOYD COUNTIES THROUGH 1145 AM CDT... At 1116 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles west of Naper, or 19 miles northeast of Springview, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Nets Peak, Mills, and Brocksburg. This includes Highway 12 between mile markers 69 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
